name: Battle For Mushroom
description:
Tower Defense prototype made during Blending Game Jam (in 48hours) with Godot Engine, the theme was "The cure". We used GDScript a programming langages similar to Python.

I was one of the two programming girl, i was in charge of part of Gameplay.

Programming : Esther & Sophie
Sound: Quentin & Marilyn
Graphism : Quentin
